help.Directions:
##Directions
 Help the frog get to the last stone.

 ##Functions
 `jump(number)` - The frog with the specified number jumps to the adjacent rock or over one frog if their is an empty space.

##Directions
 Help the two frogs each get to the last stone in the direction they are facing.

 ##Functions
 `jump(number)` - The frog with the specified number jumps to the adjacent rock or over one frog if their is an empty space.

##Directions
 Help the two groups of frogs cross each other and get in line at the end of the stone.

 ##Functions
 `jump(number)` - The frog with the specified number jumps to the adjacent rock or over one frog if their is an empty space.

##Directions
 Help the two groups of frogs cross each other and get in line at the end of the stone.

 ##Functions
 `jump(number)` - The frog with the specified number jumps to the adjacent rock or over one frog if their is an empty space.

##Directions
 Help the two groups of frogs cross each other and get in line at the end of the stone.

 ##Functions
 `jump(number)` - The frog with the specified number jumps to the adjacent rock or over one frog if their is an empty space.
